Question
========
You investigate whether attending an premier league soccer game has an effect on your own level of sports practice. You draw a random sample of people and measure their physical activity before attending the soccer match, the day after attending the soccer game and 3 months after attending the soccer game.  
  
Which statistical model is correct for this situation?

Answerlist
----------
* One-way ANOVA
* Regression with a moderation effect (interaction)
* One-way repeated measures ANOVA
* Mixed-design ANOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
